name: Overview
data:
[{"id":"b532241b-ff55-432b-9bbc-96480331f83d","type":"heading","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left","level":3,"isToggleable":false},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Class Documentation: ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"ClassManager","styles":{"code":true}}],"children":[]},{"id":"818c2f24-dd75-4037-bb2b-200076e0638f","type":"paragraph","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"The ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"ClassManager","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" serves as a central registry for tracking class structures within the analyzed codebase. It ensures that each class is represented by a unique ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"ClassNode","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" and provides a global lookup mechanism to retrieve class metadata across different modules.","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"8974d8a3-e645-4d24-ac07-c255a91f7307","type":"divider","props":{},"children":[]},{"id":"3f73085e-782f-4ad7-9e62-26df952c0179","type":"heading","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left","level":4,"isToggleable":false},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Attributes","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"e0357a0b-26f8-4fd4-b504-8f35d42c28df","type":"bulletListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"names","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" (","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"dict","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":"): The internal repository mapping fully qualified class names to their corresponding ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"ClassNode","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" instances.","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"a83de70f-4301-474f-8653-bbc85860e1b9","type":"divider","props":{},"children":[]},{"id":"f4224b27-7f21-4a37-aa92-77384da62198","type":"heading","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left","level":4,"isToggleable":false},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Methods","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"0d797851-eb85-4fb9-8c2c-18112c7ad9ef","type":"bulletListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"__init__()
","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":"Initializes the manager with an empty registry for tracking class nodes.","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"3773d366-ee1e-438f-b982-35f3fa082dd7","type":"bulletListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"create(name, module)
","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":"Creates and registers a new ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"ClassNode","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" for a given class name and module if it does not already exist.","styles":{}}],"children":[{"id":"e636aa4f-a549-46e5-8007-3fef40f9ec50","type":"bulletListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"name","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":": The fully qualified name of the class.","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"306f95e2-146d-4e6f-8854-1bdf0bf324a8","type":"bulletListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"module","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":": The name of the module where the class is defined.","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"ce835b43-63ba-4beb-b6ab-53b3cf591726","type":"bulletListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Returns","styles":{"bold":true}},{"type":"text","text":": The existing or newly created ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"ClassNode","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" instance.","styles":{}}],"children":[]}]},{"id":"35048308-4cf4-4826-b2bc-6ec42650928d","type":"bulletListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"get(name)
","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":"Retrieves a previously registered ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"ClassNode","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" by its name.","styles":{}}],"children":[{"id":"eba82311-3fab-439f-9544-07a1ae1451bb","type":"bulletListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Returns","styles":{"bold":true}},{"type":"text","text":": The ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"ClassNode","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" instance if found, otherwise ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"None","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":".","styles":{}}],"children":[]}]},{"id":"9e10faa8-9fa7-4d19-a1f3-5e8f0f30d66f","type":"bulletListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"get_classes()
","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":"Provides access to the entire collection of registered classes.","styles":{}}],"children":[{"id":"c5b7fad8-d904-446d-a2ed-3f71137d7901","type":"bulletListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Returns","styles":{"bold":true}},{"type":"text","text":": A dictionary of all tracked class names and their nodes.","styles":{}}],"children":[]}]},{"id":"068b5507-e3c5-4b94-808a-23f98d67bef4","type":"divider","props":{},"children":[]},{"id":"789538b2-27d6-458b-9bad-e6422efbc1bb","type":"heading","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left","level":3,"isToggleable":false},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Usage Example","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"73535b2e-27b2-4853-a32d-393b739c247a","type":"paragraph","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"The ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"ClassManager","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" is used during the initial discovery phase of analysis to build a map of the project's object-oriented structure.","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"36e0f92d-5558-4a71-8acc-ee974a700035","type":"codeBlock","props":{"language":"python"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"# 1. Setup the manager
class_mgr = ClassManager()

# 2. Register a class found in 'models.py'
# This creates a unique ClassNode for 'models.User'
user_cls = class_mgr.create("models.User", "models")

# 3. Later, retrieve the class to inspect its hierarchy or methods
target = class_mgr.get("models.User")
if target:
    print(f"Class {target.name} belongs to module {target.module}")

# 4. Access all discovered classes
all_classes = class_mgr.get_classes()","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"61eefbed-cbc2-4090-b70a-835ce5b65331","type":"heading","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left","level":3,"isToggleable":false},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Insights","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"2a9ce515-6256-4fd7-8d2c-0d52511e7e48","type":"bulletListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Idempotency","styles":{"bold":true}},{"type":"text","text":": The ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"create","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" method ensures that multiple references to the same class do not result in duplicate nodes, maintaining a single "source of truth" for each class definition.","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"1b35ffb2-6bd2-4aff-931f-714ddc22816a","type":"bulletListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Module Association","styles":{"bold":true}},{"type":"text","text":": By linking classes to modules at creation time, the manager facilitates inter-module resolution, allowing the analyzer to understand where specific object types originate.","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"a64729eb-1f77-4e2d-af86-8d4d154e8412","type":"bulletListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Structural Backbone","styles":{"bold":true}},{"type":"text","text":": This class works alongside the ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"ModuleManager","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" to provide a complete picture of the project's architecture, specifically focusing on the object-oriented relationships and hierarchies.","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"79935537-d592-415a-876b-1210bc94c7fe","type":"paragraph","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[],"children":[]}]
